metadata.title: CVE-2018-17480 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Execution of user supplied Javascript during array deserialization leadingto an out of bounds write in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 71.0.3578.80allowed a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
